title: Pachai Kiligal Tholodu Lyrics Indian
stanzas:
pachchai kiligal tholodu
pattuk kuyilo maniyodu
boologam aanandhin ellai
indha boomikku
kanneer sondham illai (2)

chinna siru
koottukulla sorgam irukku
ada chinna chinna
anbilthaane jeeven
innum irukku

ada paasam mattum
podhum kanne
kaasu panam ennathukku

pachchai kiligal tholodu
pattuk kuyilo maniyodu
boologam aanandhin ellai
indha boomikku
kanneer sondham illai

andha vinnil aanandham
indha mannil aanandham
adi boomi pandhai
mutti vadha pullil
aanantham

vayilin sutham aanandham
mazhayin satham aanandham
ada mazhayil kooda
saayam pogaa vaanavil
aanandham

vazhvil nooraanandham
vazhve peraanandham
penne narai ezhudhum
suyaharidham
adhil anbae aanandham
aananadham

pachchai kiligal tholodu
pattuk kuyilo maniyodu
boologam aanandhin ellai
indha boomikku
kanneer sondham illai

un moochil naan vazhnthaal
en mudhmai aanandham
nee innoru ennai
pettraal innum aanantham

pani kottum mathathil
un vetpam aanandham
en kaadhu varaikkum
kambili pothum
karunai aanantham

sondham ooraanandham
bandham peraanandham
kanne un vizhiyaal
pirar azhuthaal
kanneerum aanandham
aanandham

pachchai kiligal tholodu
pattuk kuyilo maniyodu
boologam aanandhin ellai
indha boomikku
kanneer sondham illai

chinna siru
koottukulla sorgam irukku
ada chinna chinna
anbilthaane jeeven
innum irukku

ada paasam mattum
podhum kanne
kaasu panam ennathukku

pachchai kiligal tholodu
pattuk kuyilo maniyodu
boologam aanandhin ellai
indha boomikku
kanneer sondham illai
